header__colors.info: Gradient replaces solid colors when set.

header__highlight.info: To add an animated highlight to text, simply wrap it in italics. Click the "I" button in the editor to toggle italics when highlighting text.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

heading_tag.label: Heading tag
heading_tag.info: Specify heading code types for SEO and search engines for crawling purposes.

highlighted_scribble.label: Highlighted scribble
highlighted_scribble.info: Requires highlighted text style to be set to "Hand-drawn scribble".

transparent_footer.label: Allow transparent footer
transparent_footer.info: This setting only applies when this section is the last one.

transparent_header.label: Allow transparent header
transparent_header.info: This setting only applies when this section is the first one.

header__reviews.info: Install the [Shopify Product Reviews app](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) to use this feature. Only shows on product pages.

enable_reviews_integration.label: Enable Product Reviews integration
enable_reviews_integration.info: Adjust the Product Reviews app to the look and feel of the theme. Turn off to use the original app design.

mode.label: Display mode
mode.info: In "Test mode", the popup always displays despite the relevant settings or dismissing so that you can review it all the time. When satisfied with the look, switch to "Enable".

expiry.label: Frequency
expiry.info: Number of days before a dismissed popup reappears.

content_position.label: Content position
content_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

paragraph.content: Does not appear on mobile in order to meet Google's [interstitial guidelines](https://developers.google.com/search/blog/2016/08/helping-users-easily-access-content-on) for improved SEO.

show_social.label: Show social media icons
show_social.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

enable_country_selector.label: Enable country/region selector
enable_country_selector.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings](/admin/settings/markets).

enable_language_selector.label: Enable language selector
enable_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages).

announcement_position.label: Desktop announcement position
announcement_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

post_limit.label: Number of blog posts to show

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button
show_view_all.info: If blog includes more blog posts than shown.

paragraph.content: Cart drawer won't appear to your customers if you have set the cart type to "Page" in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=cart).

show_shipping_calculator.label: Show shipping rates calculator
show_shipping_calculator.info: If your customer is logged in, the country in their default shipping address will be selected.

header__free_shipping.info: Make sure that you have properly configured your [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping).

free_shipping_minimum_amount.label: Free shipping minimum amount
free_shipping_minimum_amount.info: Enter amount using number only. If using multiple currencies, separate each currency code with its amount (e.g: USD:100, EUR:95, JPY:13000)

header__cart_recommendations.info: Dynamic recommendations are based on the items in your cart. They change and improve with time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations).

cart_recommendations_products.label: Product recommendations
cart_recommendations_products.info: Suggest additional products to your customers.

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button
show_view_all.info: If list includes more collections than shown.

paragraph.content: All submissions are sent to the customer email address of your store. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/add-contact-form#view-contact-form-submissions).
To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.
Custom fields are used to collect customization information via your contact form.

header__checkbox.info: Requires line item property type to be "Checkbox".

header__radio.info: Requires line item property type to be "Radio buttons".

header__dropdown.info: Requires line item property type to be "Dropdown list".

options.label: Options
options.info: Separate your options with a comma (e.g: Option 1, Option 2, Option 3)

paragraph.content: Ask your customers for consent to use cookies and process their data, as required by the European Union's ePrivacy Directive and General Data Protection Regulation. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/your-account/privacy/GDPR)

mode.label: Display mode
mode.info: In "Test mode", the banner always displays despite the relevant settings or dismissing so that you can review it all the time. When satisfied with the look, switch to "Enable".

delay.label: Delay
delay.info: Delay is disabled in theme editor for visibility.

content_position.label: Content position
content_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

button_label_1.label: Accept button label
button_label_1.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Decline button label
button_label_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

liquid.label: Liquid code
liquid.info: Add app snippets or other code to create advanced customizations. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/docs/api/liquid)

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button
show_view_all.info: If collection has more products than shown.

header__country_selector.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

header__language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header__policy.info: To add store policies, go to your [policy settings](/admin/settings/legal).

header__newsletter.info: Subscribers added automatically to your "accepted marketing" customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__social.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

header__follow.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

show_social.label: Show social media icons
show_social.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

enable_country_selector.label: Enable country/region selector
enable_country_selector.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings](/admin/settings/markets).

enable_language_selector.label: Enable language selector
enable_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages).

header__transparent.info: Add a section on first position which allows transparent header such as image with text overlay.

menu_title.label: Menu item
menu_title.info: Enter the name of the menu item you'd like to apply a mega menu. [Learn more](https://roartheme.co/blogs/concept/how-to-create-a-mega-menu)

image_width.label: Desktop image width
image_width.info: Image is automatically optimized for mobile.

layout.label: Desktop image placement
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

header.info: Requires marquee style to be enabled.

paragraph.content: Custom fields are used to collect customization information via your registration form.

header__checkbox.info: Requires line item property type to be "Checkbox".

header__radio.info: Requires line item property type to be "Radio buttons".

header__dropdown.info: Requires line item property type to be "Dropdown list".

options.label: Options
options.info: Separate your options with a comma (e.g: Option 1, Option 2, Option 3)

header__colors.info: Ignored when no image is used.

show_image.label: Show featured image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the pages featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

paragraph.content: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)

show_shipping_calculator.label: Show shipping rates calculator
show_shipping_calculator.info: If your customer is logged in, the country in their default shipping address will be selected.

paragraph.content: Make sure that you have properly configured your [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping)

minimum_amount.label: Free shipping minimum amount
minimum_amount.info: Enter amount using number only. If using multiple currencies, separate each currency code with its amount (e.g: USD:100, EUR:95, JPY:13000)

paragraph.content: This information can be collected from the buyer on the cart page.

header__checkbox.info: Requires line item property type to be "Checkbox".

header__radio.info: Requires line item property type to be "Radio buttons".

header__dropdown.info: Requires line item property type to be "Dropdown list".

options.label: Options
options.info: Separate your options with a comma (e.g: Option 1, Option 2, Option 3)

paragraph.content: Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

show_image.label: Show collection image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

header__colors.info: Ignored when no image is used.

show_collections_link.label: Show collections page in breadcrumb list

enable_filtering.label: Enable filtering
enable_filtering.info: Customize filters with the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)

filter_type.label: Desktop filter layout
filter_type.info: Drawer is the default mobile layout.

paragraph.content: Links to collections from your menu will appear here. [Learn more](https://roartheme.co/blogs/concept/how-to-create-sub-collections)
Blocks may be hidden if not enough products are visible.

logo_width_mobile.label: Mobile logo width
logo_width_mobile.info: Set as a max-width, may appear smaller

paragraph.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose "Selected" and add collections.

sort.label: Sort collections by:
sort.info: Sorting only applies when "All" is selected.

image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections)

header__transparent.info: Add a section on last position which allows transparent footer such as image with text overlay.

media_size.label: Desktop media width
media_size.info: Media is automatically optimized for mobile.

image_zoom.label: Image zoom
image_zoom.info: Click and hover defaults to open lightbox on mobile.

hide_variants.label: Hide other variants media after selecting a variant

enable_video_autoplay.label: Enable video autoplay
enable_video_autoplay.info: Video are muted automatically to allow autoplay.

show_collections_link.label: Show collections page in breadcrumb list

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block)

enable_color_swatches.label: Enable color swatches
enable_color_swatches.info: Requires variant picker type to be "Button". [Learn how to set up swatches](https://roartheme.co/blogs/concept/how-to-set-up-color-swatches)

color_swatch_type.label: Swatch type
color_swatch_type.info: Variant image mode requires that all variants have an associated image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-media/add-images-variants#add-images-to-existing-variants)

paragraph__size.content: Products that are eligible for size chart function [must have a Size option](https://roartheme.co/blogs/concept/how-to-enable-size-chart-on-product-pages)

paragraph.content: Link products of different colors using swatches. [Learn more](https://roartheme.co/blogs/concept/creating-product-variations-to-link-to-different-pages)

option_value_metafield.label: Option value metafield
option_value_metafield.info: Enter namespace and key of the metafield holding the value. Eg.: custom.color

products.label: Products
products.info: Select all the variations (including the product itself).

color_swatch_type.label: Swatch type
color_swatch_type.info: Product image mode requires that all products have an associated image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-media/add-images-variants#add-images-to-existing-variants)

inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold
inventory_threshold.info: Choose 0 to always show in stock if available.

show_inventory_transfer.label: Show inventory transfer notice
show_inventory_transfer.info: Learn how to create inventory transfers [here](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/inventory/transfers/create-transfer)

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift cards
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Allows buyers to send gift cards on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

paragraph.content: Allow your customers to see availability in retail stores by [setting up local pickup](https://help.shopify.com/manual/sell-in-person/shopify-pos/order-management/local-pickup-for-online-orders).

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the pages featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block)
To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.

paragraph.content: To configure a countdown timer for your products, please follow the steps outlined in [this tutorial](https://roartheme.co/blogs/concept/can-i-add-countdown-timer-to-my-products).
Line item properties are used to collect customization information for an item added to the cart.

required.label: Required
required.info: If you use "Required" with a checkbox, then the checkbox will need to be checked for the customer to add the item to the cart.

header__checkbox.info: Requires line item property type to be "Checkbox".

header__radio.info: Requires line item property type to be "Radio buttons".

header__dropdown.info: Requires line item property type to be "Dropdown list".

options.label: Options
options.info: Separate your options with a comma (e.g: Option 1, Option 2, Option 3)

paragraph.content: Keep add to cart button visible as customers browse and scroll.

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google maps will find the exact location

map_api_key.label: Google Maps API key
map_api_key.info: You'll need to [register a Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display the map

image.info: Displayed if the map isn't loaded

paragraph.content: Subscribers added automatically to your "accepted marketing" customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)
To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

mode.label: Display mode
mode.info: In "Test mode", the popup always displays despite the relevant settings or dismissing so that you can review it all the time. When satisfied with the look, switch to "Enable".

only_visitor.label: Show only for visitors
only_visitor.info: Customers who have created an account on your shop won't see it

delay.label: Delay
delay.info: Delay is disabled in theme editor for visibility.

expiry.label: Frequency
expiry.info: Number of days before a dismissed popup reappears.

content_position.label: Content position
content_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

paragraph.content: Does not appear on mobile in order to meet Google's [interstitial guidelines](https://developers.google.com/search/blog/2016/08/helping-users-easily-access-content-on) for improved SEO.
Shows on the screen as customers scroll up.

show_social.label: Show social media icons
show_social.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

metafields.label: Metafields
metafields.info: Enter namespace and key of the metafield holding the value. Each metafield must be in its own line.

paragraph.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)
Recently viewed products are only visible when browsing outside of the editor.
Search drawer won't appear to your customers if you have set the cart type to "Page" in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=search).

stencil_text.label: Stencil text
stencil_text.info: May not work in all browsers.

header__video_url.info: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

enable_video_autoplay.label: Enable video autoplay
enable_video_autoplay.info: Video are muted automatically to allow autoplay.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.info: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)

video_width.label: Desktop video width
video_width.info: Video is automatically optimized for mobile.

layout.label: Desktop video placement
layout.info: Video first is the default mobile layout.

logo_width_mobile.label: Mobile logo width
logo_width_mobile.info: Set as a max-width, may appear smaller

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

paragraph.content: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

swatch_config.label: Configuration
swatch_config.info: Each rule must be in its own line. [Learn more](https://roartheme.co/blogs/concept/how-to-set-up-color-swatches) about the exact naming convention.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block)

show_countdown.label: Show countdown timer
show_countdown.info: To configure a countdown timer for your products, please follow the steps outlined in [this tutorial](https://roartheme.co/blogs/concept/can-i-add-countdown-timer-to-my-products).

enable_quick_view.label: Enable quick view feature
enable_quick_view.info: View product details in a popup without leaving the current page.

color_swatch_type.label: Swatch type
color_swatch_type.info: Variant image mode requires that all variants have an associated image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-media/add-images-variants#add-images-to-existing-variants)

disable_collection_portion.label: Remove the collection portion from product URLs for better SEO
